content:
What is the best way to avoid compiling mathlib? My current attempt is to run lake exe cache get, then restart the server, then open the file. But it is still adamant that it wants to compile (see screenshot)!
Screenshot 2025-06-07 at 5.41.50 PM.png
You could try lake exe cache get!, which sometimes fixes this specific thing for me
It picks up right where it left off, unfortunately.
Have you tried turning it off and back on again?

Ok. I managed to get it working by deleting mathlib and its dependencies, from .lake/packages, deleting lakemanifest.json, running lake exe cache get!, and then restarting the server.

It would be kind of nice if by default mathlib would refuse to compile.
Chase Norman has marked this topic as resolved.
